p: The rats were injected with 10% chloral hydrate into the abdominal cavity. The liver and spleen were removed from the abdomen after they were euthanized. The rats were washed with normal saline at 4°C, and the excess water was removed using filter paper. After weighing, the coefficient (index) of the liver and spleen were calculated as follows: organ index=organ quality (g)/individual quality (g) ×100%.
